Description: AI-powered acquisition assistance tool for NCI Office of Acquisitions. Demo by Feb 12, Working App by Feb 28.
User can complete a guided intake for <$15K purchase and receive document package. This is the core demo flow that must work flawlessly.
Acceptance Criteria:
- User enters basic acquisition info (item, timeline, funding)
- System asks clarifying questions via chat
- Document checklist updates dynamically
- User can download complete package

Description: Generated documents download as .docx (primary) or .pdf (fallback). Critical differentiator from current text-only output.
Acceptance Criteria:
- SOW generates as .docx
- Acquisition Plan generates as .docx
- IGCE generates as .docx
- PDF fallback available
- Pre-signed S3 URLs for download

Description: Sidebar shows required documents based on dollar value and acquisition type. Some items become N/A based on thresholds.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Checklist renders in sidebar
- Items marked complete/incomplete/N/A
- Updates dynamically as user provides info
- <$15K shows minimal docs
- >$250K shows full package requirements

Summary: I Don't Know Options on All Forms
Description: Every form question has escape hatch - system moves on or agent assists. Prevents user analysis paralysis and abandonment.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Every question has 'I don't know' option
- Selecting it either skips question or triggers agent assistance
- Clear messaging that questions are optional
- System progresses even without all answers

Description: Real-time agent responses with color-coded agent labels. Shows which agent is responding (Supervisor, Compliance, Tech, etc.)
Acceptance Criteria:
- Agent messages stream in real-time
- Color-coded by agent type
- Agent name/label visible
- Model labels shown in agent logs

Description: Conversations saved to database, resumable across sessions. Users can return to incomplete acquisitions.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Conversations stored in PostgreSQL
- Session ID tracked
- Can resume previous conversation
- Message history preserved

Description: Users can access previous intake sessions from a dropdown menu.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Dropdown shows previous sessions
- Sessions sorted by date
- Can select to resume
- Current session highlighted

Description: Negotiated contracts ($250K+) with full document generation. Part 15 procedures with complete documentation package.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Handles >$250K acquisitions
- Generates full package (AP, SOW, IGCE, J&A if needed)
- Part 15 guidance provided
- All required FAR clauses identified

Description: Ingest previous package files, understand context, and generate updated package for current year.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Upload previous package files
- System parses and understands content
- Asks tuning/configuration questions
- Generates updated package with current year info

Description: Add money, time, or scope to existing contracts. Generate modification package.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Identify existing contract
- Select modification type (funding, PoP, scope)
- System generates mod package
- Handles bilateral and unilateral mods

Description: Very simple acquisition for items under micro-purchase threshold (~$14K). Should complete in seconds.
Acceptance Criteria:
- User provides quote
- System identifies as micro-purchase
- Minimal questions asked
- Purchase request generated for credit card
- Done in seconds

Description: Supervisor agent delegates to specialized agents (Compliance, Tech, Legal) when user doesn't know answer or needs expertise.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Supervisor detects 'I don't know' responses
- Routes to appropriate sub-agent
- Compliance agent for FAR questions
- Tech agent for SOW review
- Results flow back to supervisor

Description: Documents stored in S3 with pre-signed URLs and version tracking per conversation.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Documents written to S3
- Pre-signed URLs generated
- Version tracking per conversation
- Secure download links

Description: FAR/HHSAR clause validation. Knows Part 13 vs Part 15 decisions.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Validates FAR applicability
- Identifies required clauses
- Part 13 vs Part 15 routing
- HHSAR prescription checks

Description: ECS deployment with CDK. CloudFront for frontend. Production-ready infrastructure.
Acceptance Criteria:
- CDK stacks deployed
- ECS service running
- CloudFront distribution
- Route53 DNS configured
- HTTPS enabled

Description: Migrate AI layer to Bedrock AgentCore for production-grade observability and logging.
Acceptance Criteria:
- AgentCore SDK integrated
- Observability enabled
- Logging configured
- Memory/sessions working

Summary: Fix Spinning Icons - Remove Mock Data
Description: Per spec 20260202-fix-spinning-icons-remove-mock-data.md
Acceptance Criteria:
- Remove mock data from UI
- Fix loading state indicators
- Real data flowing through

Description: Per spec 20260202-chat-first-ui-redesign.md
Acceptance Criteria:
- Implement chat-first layout
- Agent logs panel
- Responsive design

Description: Separate dev/prod environments with proper configuration.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Dev environment configured
- Prod environment configured
- Environment variables separated
- Deployment pipelines

Description: Research Optimizer and EAGLE sharing cache causing cross-contamination.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Identify cache source
- Implement isolation
- Test with clean sessions

Description: Simple + Complex acquisition walkthrough for stakeholders (Olga, key COs)
Acceptance Criteria:
- Happy path demo working
- Document export functional
- Dynamic checklist visible
- No crashes or errors

Description: Full MVP with all P0/P1 features operational
Acceptance Criteria:
- All 4 core use cases working
- Multi-agent routing functional
- S3 storage integrated
- Session persistence working

Description: Production-ready system with full documentation
Acceptance Criteria:
- Production deployed
- Documentation complete
- Training materials ready
- Handoff to operations
